title: Demi Moore, 56, looks decades younger than her age as the actress steps out with daughter Scout, 28
text:
There's 28 years between them.

But Demi Moore, 56, and Scout Willis, 28, looked closer to sisters than mother and daughter when the pair stepped out in Los Angeles together on Monday.

The Bandits actress and her famous mom both wore their straight raven tresses loose and with a center part for the shopping trip.

Fountain of youth: Demi Moore, 56 [L], and Scout Willis, 28, looked closer to sisters than mother and daughter when the pair stepped out in Los Angeles together on Monday

Demi hid her impeccable physique beneath a loose-fitting brown jumpsuit, worn with white sneakers.

The Ghost actress added a touch of specs appeal with dark framed glasses and was loaded up with a handbag and an armful of clothing.

The daughter she shares with ex-husband Bruce Willis rocked a denim dress worn over a sweater with a deep plunging neckline.

Modest: Demi hid her impeccable physique beneath a loose-fitting brown jumpsuit, worn with white sneakers

Meanwhile, Moore's recently released tell-all memoir Inside Out has been a blockbuster.

Earlier this month, she took the time to celebrate herself and her achievements.

The St Elmo's Fire star took to Instagram to celebrate her just published book reaching the top of The New York Times Best Sellers list.

'Got my cover all dressed up to tell you the big news... #InsideOutBook just hit #1 on @nytimes bestseller list!' she announced in the post's caption.

'This is all so much more than I could have expected and I am so overwhelmed by the support and love you’ve given it. Thank you guys for reading and allowing it to resonate with you xx,' Moore wrote.

Accessories: The Ghost actress added a touch of specs appeal with dark framed glasses and was loaded up with a handbag and an armful of clothing

In the first photo in the series, the G.I. Jane star can be seen smiling while holding a copy of the novel.

The second photo is a screenshot of the list, with Inside Out at the top spot in the nonfiction category.

In the book, the Striptease actress details her marriages and divorces along with raising the three daughters she shares with Bruce Willis as well as her battle with drug and alcohol addiction.

She also talks about growing up in New Mexico as the daughter of a mother who had her own struggles with addiction and a dad who wasn't her biological father.
description: Demi Moore, 56, and Scout Willis, 28, looked closer to sisters than mother and daughter when the pair stepped out in Los Angeles together on Monday.
